abstract.t: This purpose of this document is to define terminology specific tomeasuring the performance of IPsec devices. It builds upon thetenets set forth in [RFC1242], [RFC2544], [RFC2285] and other IETFBenchmarking Methodology Working Group (BMWG) documents used forbenchmarking routers and switches. This document seeks to extendthese efforts specific to the IPsec paradigm. The BMWG produces twomajor classes of documents: Benchmarking Terminology documents andBenchmarking Methodology documents. The Terminology documentspresent the benchmarks and other related terms. The Methodologydocuments define the procedures required to collect the benchmarkscited in the corresponding Terminology documents.
